channel.title: dynamics on CST Strategy Project Notes
channel.description: Recent content in dynamics on CST Strategy Project Notes

item.title: CO-CST tangling analysis
item.description: Overall task tangling ❓ CST is much more feedback driven than CO. Does this show up as M1 dynamics being less apparently autonomous? That is, is neural tangling higher in CST than CO? ✔️ Tangling doesn’t really appear to be much higher in CST than CO, suggesting that the feedback may be “predictable” most of the time. 💬 Does tangling depend on the amount of data you use to check it?
